messages.body: $AAPL Metal tariffs would be a 'rounding error' for Apple at worst, analyst says https://www.cnbc.com/2018/03/07/metal-tariffs-would-be-a-rounding-error-for-apple-at-worst-gbh.html

links.title: Metal tariffs would be a 'rounding error' for Apple at worst, analyst says
links.description: Zach Gibson | Bloomberg | Getty Images Apple has little to fear from potential new tariffs, according to Dan Ives, an analyst at GBH Insights. President Donald Trump announced tariffs this month on imported steel and aluminum and declared publicly that "trade wars aren't so bad."

links.title: Trump Expected to Sign Steel and Aluminum Tariffs on Thursday
links.description: WASHINGTON - President Trump is expected to formally sign off on imposing stiff tariffs on steel and aluminum imports at noon on Thursday, according to people familiar with the deliberations, although advisers close to the White House emphasized that the timing could change.

links.description: Gary Cohn who? Donald Trump steel tariffs? Who cares given the health of Corporate America's balance sheets.
